BALI AYUNG RAFTING TOUR

BALI AYUNG RAFTING TOUR IS RIVER ADVENTURE EXPERIENCE TO ENJOY WHITE WATER RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER UBUD BALI ISLANDS

Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of the best Bali Rafting Tour Packages in northern part of Ubud with the beautiful and high riverbank. Ripples irrigate the river rock, tracing Bali nature pass the river which is full of fun and pass the attractive and challenging rapids are the Impressive Ayung River Rafting experience on your vacation in Bali. Ayung River one of the best whitewater river in Bali for rating activities. Easily access and located near famous tourism site which is Ubud. If you have visit Bali and for a few day you feel enough with sun bathing and had enough beach, then go to Ubud village. From Ubud village you will easily access Ayung River one of the most famous Bali River.

Ayung Rafting Impressive Experience

An impressive Rafting experience trace the Ayung River will be started from your pick up schedule at the hotel resident and drop to start point to get the short training from well trained and experience Ayung Rafting guide. Movement raw the safe and high quality rubber boat and also led by professional guide which have Bali Rafting Experience to pass the attractive and challenge rapids with full of fun. Bali River Ayung is close by to Ubud village, is about 5 kilometer. As all you know Ubud village is the center of Balinese arts and many top dancers, painters, carvers, fine artists are live in Ubud Village. If you would like to discover a hidden waterfall than you can find it here. Scenery and wild life that you can get here such as rice field, jungle, Kingfisher and water fall. If you do Ayung rafting Bali than you will enjoy Bali rain forest and very well maintain rice field. You may also able to see wild life on Bali rain forest such as beautiful Blue Javan Kingfisher.

Ayung Rafting Difficulty Level: Class II-III / Beginner

The rapids class on River of Ayung is for beginner also very easy to access and suitable for those who never try rafting activities before and can be considered as family friendly whitewater river. For you who would like to do Bali rafting at River of Ayung, you don't need to wait for good season, because it's year-round season. Ayung River rafting Bali offer short or half-day rafting and available all year-round. Bali also offer other river for rafting Telaga Waja River , the most challenging river for seeking an ultimate rafting experience. Your Ayung Rafting above water river, take a bath in natural waterfall and also view Bali nature which still be wild represent the amazing experience which is not fallen into oblivion. Your Bali Rafting Tour adventure in the water will end at the finish point and enjoy the buffet lunch at the same time enjoy the nature of Ubud Bali. Taking shower and change clothes will be reserved to refresh your body. The comfortable transportation which have been provided will bring the you return to hotel with fully memory. Enjoy the white water rafting adventure at Ayung River is correct choice for the adventure in river water. With the complete facilities and also supported by the staff which professional and skilled in this classic Ayung Rafting hence adventure dream in Bali will be existed.

Bali Ayung Rafting Tour Itinerary :

Morning Session

  • 08.00 - pick up at hotel (the time is depend on your location)
  • 09.45 - arrive at starting point of ayung river, short briefing and change of clotch
  • 10.00 - enjoy the Ayung rafting adventure
  • 12.00 - rafting finish and go to finish point
  • 12.30 - enjoy lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • 13.30 - lunch finish and back to hotel
  • 15.00 - arrive at hotel

Afternoon Session

  • 11.30 - pick up at hotel
  • 13.00 - arrive at starting point of ayung river
  • 13.30 - enjoy the Ayung rafting adventure
  • 15.30 - rafting finish and go to finish point
  • 16.00 - enjoy meal
  • 17.00 - meal finish and back to hotel
  • 18.30 - arrive at hotel

Bali Ayung Rafting Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 650.000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 450.000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 375.000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 325.000/person
  • 5 Person : IDR 300.000 or More

Note :

  • The age for children to participate in rafting is 7 years up
  • For group booking, please contact us for special price

Bali Ayung Rafting Tour Services Include

  • Return Transfer from your hotel
  • Safety-approved Rafting equipment
  • Professional River Guide
  • Use of towels, shower and locker facilities
  • Use Waterproof Bag
  • Changing room and toilet facilities
  • Lunch Buffet Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

What to bring During Bali Ayung Rafting Tour

  • Rafting outfit IT-shirt, short pants or swimsuit, river sandals!
  • Towel & Change of clothes (waterproof bags will be supplied)
  • Sunscreen is recommended

Bali Ayung Rafting Tour Notice :

Bali Ayung Rafting Tour is not suitable for pregnant women, people with heart problem, people is respiratory problem, currently has a sinus problem, recently has ear infection, has claustrophobia problem.

Area Covered for Pick Up and Drop Off :

Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area
